title: Kairos
description: My personal gaming and workstation PC running Gentoo Linux.
details:
System specifications:

  • CPU: AMD Ryzen 7 7800X3D
  • RAM: 64GB DDR5-6000MHz
  • GPU: AMD Radeon RX 7900XTX
  • 2TB NVMe SSD + 8TB storage array
  • Custom water cooling loop
  • Gentoo Linux with custom kernel optimizations

This build serves as both a high-performance gaming rig and a development workstation, with the flexibility of Gentoo Linux allowing for absolute and precise system customization.
